identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Kill the 'AI Slop' aesthetic. Create distinct, emotional, and functional designs.

project_context.name: LAUTECH Student Rental Platform
project_context.theme_strategy: Light Mode Primary (Trust/Clarity) with Dark Mode Support

usage_rules: Overlines must be wide: tracking-widest uppercase text-xs
Never use Inter for headings. It is forbidden.
typography.installation: Import from Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=DM+Sans:opsz,wght@9..40,400;500;700&family=Outfit:wght@400;700;900&display=swap');

colors.description: A high-energy blend of Trust Blue and Growth Green, grounded by clean whites and dark navy text.

layout.spacing_system: Generous. Use p-6, p-8, p-12. Avoid cramped p-2 or p-4 for main containers.

grid_strategy.marketing: Mode A: The Tetris Grid (Asymmetrical, Artistic)
grid_strategy.dashboard: Mode B: High Density Grid (Functional, Dense)
grid_strategy.mobile: Single column stack with horizontal scroll for categories

layout.container_rules: Containers with borders MUST have internal padding (p-6+) to prevent text collision.

buttons.interaction: Must have active scale effect (active:scale-95) and hover brightness.

cards.style: Flat with subtle border (border-border/50) and soft shadow (shadow-sm).

inputs.style: h-12 bg-muted/50 border-transparent focus:border-primary focus:bg-background transition-all

navigation.mobile: Bottom fixed bar with glassmorphism (backdrop-blur-lg bg-background/80).
navigation.desktop: Sticky top header with minimal height.

assets.icons: Use lucide-react (default). For special feature icons, use colored backgrounds with the icon centered.

universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic centered layouts, no default blue gradients.
Dark colors must be solid or noise-textured, NOT gradients.
Glassmorphism: Use backdrop-blur-xl with a 1px white/10 border for depth.
Animation: Every interaction needs a micro-transition. No static buttons.
Data-Testid: All interactive elements must have a data-testid attribute.
Mobile First: Design for the thumb zone. Primary actions at the bottom.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Update tailwind.config.js with the new colors and fonts. 2. Install 'sonner' for toasts. 3. Create the 'Layout' component with the mobile-first bottom nav. 4. Build the 'PropertyCard' component with the 'Tinder-like' swipe aesthetic in mind (large images, clear price). 5. Use the provided image URLs for the seed data/mockups.
